channel.title: How can i change the delay on ice barrage
channel.description:
ive been on my server and ive noticed u have to wait like forever to barrage after u have done it once example:
first barrage---------------second barrage
- = seconds im not sure what to change im pretty sure its a timer or something i changed the one under ice barrage but i dont know where else to go if someone can help me id be glad to listen ;D

item.title: How can i change the delay on ice barrage

item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

its definitely a timer most likely actionTimer = ### = < 2 = 1 second (500 milliseconds per call)

1000 milliseconds = 1 second just if you didnâ€™t know
